library(tidyverse)

```{r}
# read in the data and rename the columns
top1 = readxl::read_xls("./data/WID_Data_09112022-024002.xls")
cols = colnames(top1) %>% stringr::str_match("\n(.+)$")
cols = cols[,2]
cols[1] = "percentile"
cols[2] = "year"
colnames(top1) = cols
top1 = top1 %>% rename("Georgia" = "Georgia (US)")
```
